welcome.message: Hello! Welcome to Oriental Insurance Virtual Office. I'm your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

policy.message: I can help you with policy-related queries. You can view your existing policies, get policy information, renew policies, or purchase new ones. What would you like to do?

claim.message: I can assist you with claim registration and tracking. Whether you need to file a new claim or check the status of an existing one, I'm here to help.

support.message: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns. You can get assistance with grievances, technical issues, or general inquiries.

greeting.message: Hello! Great to see you in our Virtual Office. I'm here to make your insurance experience smooth and convenient. What can I assist you with today?

thanks.message: You're very welcome! I'm always here to help. Is there anything else you'd like to know about our services?

fallback.message: I understand you're looking for information. Let me connect you with the right service. You can also visit our different desks in the virtual office for specific assistance.
